description: Application utilities including enhanced error logging, debugging, and support functionality

components.ErrorLogger: Enhanced error logging system providing file-based logging, console output, and comprehensive error tracking for debugging and monitoring.

rules: File-based logging system creating timestamped log files in logs directory for persistent debug information.
Console output integration with developer tools for real-time debugging during development.
Automatic log file creation with timestamped filenames preventing log file conflicts.
debugPrint override ensuring all debug output is captured both in console and log files.
Error categorization with different log levels (error, info, warning, success, debug) for organized logging.
Stack trace capture and logging for comprehensive error analysis and debugging.
Production-safe logging with kDebugMode checks ensuring performance in release builds.
Flush functionality ensuring all log data is written to disk before application termination.
Silent failure handling preventing logging recursion and ensuring application stability.
Log file path access for debugging tools and log file management utilities.
